name: GuidedSleep
0:
”Alexa, open Guided Sleep”
”Alexa, start Guided Sleep”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guided sleep
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Fall asleep more easily, with Guided Sleep from Volley, narrated by Kate Cocker, the host of the Everyday Positivity Flash Briefing.

Join thousands of Alexa owners experiencing better sleep, lower stress, and less anxiety with Guided Sleep!

Guided Sleep features 4 categories: Bedtime Story, Bedtime Breathing and Sleep Positivity.

FEATURED GUIDED SLEEP EXERCISES:
* Guided Gratitude
* Affirmation Unwind
* Bedtime Breathing: Introduction
* And many more...

HOW TO USE:
Get started by saying "Alexa, open Guided Sleep".
Guided Sleep will play your selected exercise until you say "Alexa, stop."

PAID SUBSCRIBER FEATURES:
* Additional Guided Sleep exercises
* Subscriber-exclusive categories

FEEDBACK AND SUGGESTIONS:
If you have questions or feedback, please send an email to support@volleythat.com

Created by Volley - the makers of the hit Alexa skills Song Quiz, Volley FM, and Bedtime Stories.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
